
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(spdk-lib-util)
target_compile_options(spdk-lib-util PRIVATE
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_include_directories(spdk-lib-util PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/include
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/uuid/include
)
target_link_libraries(spdk-lib-util PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  spdk-lib-log
  contrib-libs-uuid
)
target_sources(spdk-lib-util PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/util/base64.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/util/bit_array.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/util/cpuset.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/util/crc16.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/util/crc32.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/util/dif.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/util/fd.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/util/fd_group.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/util/file.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/util/iov.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/util/math.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/util/pipe.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/util/strerror_tls.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/util/string.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/util/uuid.c
)

add_global_library_for(spdk-lib-util.global spdk-lib-util)
target_compile_options(spdk-lib-util.global PRIVATE
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_include_directories(spdk-lib-util.global PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/include
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/uuid/include
)
target_link_libraries(spdk-lib-util.global PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  spdk-lib-log
  contrib-libs-uuid
)
target_sources(spdk-lib-util.global PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/util/crc32_ieee.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/util/crc32c.c
)
